    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addAdReport(JSONObject adReport)
      Saves a new ad report to the DB, to be later sent to the server.
      void clearAdReports()
      Clears all ad reports from the DB.
      JSONArray getAdReports()
      Returns all ad reports currently in the DB as a JSON array.
      static AdsDataDB getInstance(Context context)
      Returns the singleton instance of this DB, creating it if it doesn't currently exist.
